alert.note: Alert for Glacier Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 12 at 10:28PM AKDT until October 13 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...The following area, Salmon River near Gustavus and surrounding area. * WHEN...Until 700 AM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1027 PM AKDT, satellite estimates indicate heavy rain across the advisory area. Minor flooding is expected to begin overnight, especially near the Salmon River. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches are possible. - For Salmon River at Gustavus : At 10:15pm the stage was 10.3 feet. Flood Stage is 15.5 feet.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
